Title: Redux (2)
Plot: Scully helps Mulder fake his own death in order for him to go undetected through the Department of Defence and find out the answers to his new questions about the government hoax concerning the existence of extraterrestrial life. Meanwhile, at a joint FBI/DOD inquiry, Scully's attempt to drive out the Conspiracy's informant is halted as her cancer takes a bad turn.
GuestStars: Charles Cioffi, Tom Braidwood, Dean Haglund, Bruce Harwood, John Finn, Steve Makaj, Ken Camroux, Barry W. Levy, Julia Arkos
